values: Brothers — Feel, Think, Preach God (Part 2)Brothers — Feel, Think, Preach God (Part 2)

Pastoral ministry is a call to an intellectually robust life that thinks and meditates and ponders over God’s word and God’s world for the fame of Jesus’s name.Pastoral ministry is a call to an intellectually robust life that thinks and meditates and ponders over God’s word and God’s world for the fame of Jesus’s name.
